entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
